Parameter.Title: Find delivery places based on the recipient's postal code
Parameter.Description:
Optional post office is a service that allows an end user to choose the pickup point.

The 10 nearest pickup point are returned, based on the given postal code.

The URL is specified by /api/pickuppoint/postalcode/<postalcode>.<extension>

<extension> = xml | json

<postalcode> = a valid ZIP code

Example below: Delivery locations near postalcode 1407 Vinterbro

Parameter.Title: Find delivery places based on optional location
Parameter.Description:
The 10 nearest pickup point are returned, based on the given postal code.

The URL is specified by /api/pickuppoint/location/<latitude>/<longitude>.<extension>

<extension> = xml | json

Example below: Delivery Locations near the position of Oslo city (60.395226, 5.321725)

Parameter.Title: Filter results by text
Parameter.Description:
Is specified by adding ?searchForText=<text>

You can search by name, address, city, municipality name, county name or location, and the search string can include partial names / criterias.

Example below: Search for text "KIWI" near postal code 1407.

Parameter.Title: Filter results by opening times
Parameter.Description:
Is spesified by adding ?openingHoursSearchType=<day>

Requires that the place is open on the day (s) as specified.

If you want you can also send openOnOrBefore and / or openOnOrAfter, then apply it in the day specified in this parameter.

The options are ALL_WEEKDAYS (default), MONDAY, TUESDAY, WEDNESDAY, THURSDAY, FRIDAY, SATURDAY, SUNDAY

Example: ?openingHoursSearchType=SUNDAY

Parameter.Title: Filter results by opening hours (on or before)
Parameter.Description:
Is spesified by adding ?openOnOrBefore=<HHMM>

Requires that the place is open on the specified time.

Format HHMM

Example: ?openOnOrBefore=0800

Parameter.Title: Filter results by opening hours (on or after)
Parameter.Description:
Is spesified by adding ?openOnOrAfter=<HHMM>

Requires that the place is open on the specified time.

Format HHMM

Example: ?openOnOrAfter=0800
